languages.text: "В момент аварии Данрок находился на грузовой магистрали с инспекцией складов. С тех пор он не выходит на связь. Мы допускаем... худшее".
"At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."
languages.original_text: "В момент аварии Данрок находился на грузовой магистрали с инспекцией складов. С тех пор он не выходит на связь. Мы допускаем... худшее".

traits.locale_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We're assuming… the worst."
"At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We're assuming… the worst."
"At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming… the worst."
"At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming… the worst."
"At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."
"At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."

languages.text: «En el momento del accidente, Danrok estaba en la línea de carga inspeccionando los almacenes. No ha dado señales de vida. Nos tememos... lo peor».
languages.original_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."

traits.locale_text: «En el momento del accidente, Danrok estaba en la línea de carga inspeccionando los almacenes. No ha dado señales de vida. Nos tememos... lo peor».

languages.text: 「事故が起きたとき、ダンロックは貨物線で倉庫を点検していました。それ以来、連絡がとれません。私たちは…最悪の結末を念頭に置いています」
languages.original_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."

traits.locale_text: 「事故が起きたとき、ダンロックは貨物線で倉庫を点検していました。それ以来、連絡がとれません。私たちは…最悪の結末を念頭に置いています」

languages.text: “事故发生的时候，丹罗克正在货运区域检查库房，在那之后他就失去了联系。我们正在假设……最坏的结果。”
languages.original_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."

traits.locale_text: “事故发生的时候，丹罗克正在货运区域检查库房，在那之后他就失去了联系。我们正在假设……最坏的结果。”

languages.text: "Zur Zeit des Unfalls befand sich Danrok auf der Güterstrecke, um Lagerhäuser zu inspizieren. Seitdem gab es keinen Kontakt zu ihm. Wir gehen ... vom Schlimmsten aus."
languages.original_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."

traits.locale_text: "Zur Zeit des Unfalls befand sich Danrok auf der Güterstrecke, um Lagerhäuser zu inspizieren. Seitdem gab es keinen Kontakt zu ihm. Wir gehen ... vom Schlimmsten aus."

languages.text: « Au moment de l'incident, Danrok inspectait les entrepôts de la ligne de fret. Nous n'avons pas réussi à le contacter depuis. Nous... supposons le pire. »
languages.original_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."

traits.locale_text: « Au moment de l'incident, Danrok inspectait les entrepôts de la ligne de fret. Nous n'avons pas réussi à le contacter depuis. Nous... supposons le pire. »

languages.text: "Danrok, kaza sırasında yük hattında ardiyeleri incelemekteydi. O zamandan beri kendisinden haber alamadık. Pek... Umutlu değiliz."
languages.original_text: "At the time of the accident, Danrok was on the freight line inspecting warehouses. He has not been in contact since. We are assuming... the worst."
